headline.main: DESERT TANK WAR IS HARD TO FOLLOW; Dust and Smoke Hide Course of Armored Forces, Which Move Like Ships at Sea

lead_paragraph: WITH THE BRITISH FORCES, Outside Tobruk, Nov. 22 (Delayed) -- The British commanders have wisely refrained from predicting a victory until they have it actually in hand, but a tour of the fighting line at the hardest pressed points today and a study of the hourly changing map make it appear that the German armored units are facing a terrific battle.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
